- Is <font color = "black"><b>geography</b></font> related to whether or not a <font color = "black"><b>loan will be delinquent</b></font>?
- What <font color = "black"><b>factors</b></font> influence the <font color = "black"><b>number of delinquencies/delinquent payment amounts</b></font>? Does a history of delinquencies predict future loan defaults?
- How are <font color = "black"><b>interest rates and loan types</b></font> related and how have interest rates moved over <font color = "black"><b>time</b></font> (time series analysis of interest rates over time by loan type)?
- How well does Lending Club <font color = "grey"><b>evaluate their loan rating systems</b></font>, and how is this related to delinquencies? 
<br> <br>
<div class = "centered">
<font color = "black"><b>Goal: Analyze different factors in peer to peer lending to help Lending Club maximize successful loans based on historical data </b></font>
